summary.para: The Target node specifies formatting options to be applied to the List View rows/cells that match the current Rule.

member.name: P:DevExpress.ExpressApp.ConditionalFormatting.IModelConditionalFormattingTarget.Color

summary.para: Specifies the color to be used to highlight the current List View's data that satisfies the current Rule.

member.value: A object specifying the color to be used to highlight the current List View's data that satisfies the current Rule.

member.name: P:DevExpress.ExpressApp.ConditionalFormatting.IModelConditionalFormattingTarget.Name

summary.para: Specifies the format setting to be used to highlight the current List View's data in the specified color.

member.value: A string specifying the format setting to be used to highlight the current List View's data in the specified color.

member.name: P:DevExpress.ExpressApp.ConditionalFormatting.IModelConditionalFormattingTarget.TargetNames

summary.para: Specifies the available format settings which can be used to highlight the current List View's data.

member.value: A List@lt;String@gt; object representing the collection of the available format settings.

summary.para: The ConditionalFormatting node specifies criteria and target formatting for the List View's data.
The Rule node specifies a Rule for formatting the current List View or column data.

member.name: P:DevExpress.ExpressApp.ConditionalFormatting.IModelConditionalFormattingRule.Criteria

summary.para: Specifies criteria for the current List View's data. If it is satisfied, the current column data is formatted.

member.value: A string specifying criteria for the current List View's data. If it is satisfied, the current column data is formatted.

member.name: P:DevExpress.ExpressApp.ConditionalFormatting.IModelConditionalFormattingRule.Id

summary.para: Specifies the current formatting Rule identifier.

member.value: A string specifying the current formatting Rule identifier.

member.name: P:DevExpress.ExpressApp.ConditionalFormatting.IModelConditionalFormattingRule.Priority

summary.para: Specifies the current Rule's priority in case the List View's data satisfies several Rules.

member.value: An integer value specifying the current Rule's priority in case the List View's data satisfies several Rules.
